Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Riu Palace Jandia in Pajara (Morro Jable), you'll be convenient to Jandia Lighthouse. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Cofete Beach and Sotavento de Jandia Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 201 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Jandia Lighthouse - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Cofete Beach - 8.1 km / 5.1 mi
Sotavento de Jandia Beach - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Costa Calma Beach - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi
La Pared Beach - 22 km / 13.7 mi
Ajuy Beach - 43.2 km / 26.9 mi
Jurado Beach - 44.3 km / 27.5 mi
Betancuria Church - 50.4 km / 31.3 mi
Fuerteventura Golf Course - 59.6 km / 37 mi
Casa Museo Unamuno - 68.9 km / 42.8 mi
Cotillo Beach - 78.7 km / 48.9 mi
Corralejo Beach - 88.1 km / 54.7 mi
Corralejo Dunes Natural Park - 88.6 km / 55.1 mi
Playa Las Agujas - 89.4 km / 55.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Palace Jandia is Puerto del Rosario (FUE-Fuerteventura) - 64.6 km / 40.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
